common.add-hemi-to-wallet: Add Hemi Network to your wallet
common.erc20-approve-10x-deposits: Approve 10x the amount of this deposit
common.erc20-approve-10x-detailed-description: By activating 10x approval we automatically add 10x the amount of this transaction as allowance for future ones, saving you money on gas fees and time.
common.unexpected-error: An unexpected error has ocurred. Please try again.
common.unsupported-chain-heading: You're not connected to a supported chain

connect-wallets.btc-wallet-requirement: A Bitcoin wallet is only required if moving assets between Bitcoin and Hemi.
connect-wallets.description: Connect your EVM and BTC wallets to transfer assets seamlessly. For the best experience, use wallets from both networks.
